Description: This affordable Wolfgang model yet is decked out with a flat top in gorgeous quilt maple and featuring a special "comfort cut" forearm contour for max playing ease.Other features include a one-piece bolt-on maple neck with satin finish and graphite reinforcement, smooth and fast compound radius maple fingerboard (12"-16") with comfortably rolled edges and 22 jumbo frets, dual EVH Wolfgang direct-mount humbucking pickups, two domed black control knobs (master volume, master tone), EVH Floyd Rose Special bridge and locking nut, and EVH tuners. FeaturesBodyBody shape: Double cutawayBody type: Solid bodyTop wood: Maple quiltedBody wood: BasswoodBody finish: Gloss polyurethaneOrientation: Right handedColor: Transparent Red NeckShape: Info not availableWood: MapleJoint: Bolt-onScale length: 25.5"Truss rod: StandardFinish: Satin polyurethane FretboardMaterial: MapleRadius: CompoundFret size: JumboNumber of frets: 22Inlays: DotNut width: 1.62" (41.3mm) PickupsConfiguration: HHNeck: Direct-mounted Wolfgang humbuckingMiddle: Not applicableBridge: Direct-mounted Wolfgang humbuckingBrand: EVHActive or passive: PassiveSeries or parallel: Parallel Bought this guitar a couple of years ago when I needed a fat sounding guitar for the tunes we were doing in my last band. I have since retired from active gigging and no longer have a need for it (shame though....really nice guitar). Everything about the guitar is in good to very good condition....some very minor swirl and light pick marks (no dents or deep mars), typical of what you might find on any well cared for used guitar. Plays/sounds great....stays in tune (as it should with a properly set up Floyd Rose....its a rock) and would be an great addition to anyone looking for a great rock guitar sound. Does not include a case or gig bag, but it will be carefully prepped and packaged (original box) to ensure safe shipping. Although the guitar is as described above, its a used instrument and is being sold as is. See my feedback and bid with confidence. Good luck!
Title: EVH Wolfgang Standard 6-String Electric Guitar - Transparent Red Used
